title_full: DALREL06-BP01 Create an illustration of data flow dependencies
title: Create an illustration of data flow dependencies
description: Document and visualize the data flow dependencies across your analytics workload. Understanding the relationships between data sources, transformations, and downstream consumers helps identify single points of failure and plan for resilience.

title_full: DALREL06-BP02 Monitor analytics systems to detect ETL job failures
title: Monitor analytics systems to detect ETL job failures
description: Implement comprehensive monitoring for analytics and ETL jobs using AWS Glue job metrics, Amazon CloudWatch, and custom health checks. Detect failures quickly to minimize impact on downstream systems and data freshness SLAs.

title_full: DALREL06-BP03 Notify stakeholders about analytics or ETL job failures
title: Notify stakeholders about analytics or ETL job failures
description: Configure automated notifications for job failures using Amazon SNS, AWS Lambda, or other alerting mechanisms. Ensure the right stakeholders are notified promptly to enable quick response and remediation.

title_full: DALREL06-BP04 Automate the recovery of analytics and ETL job failures
title: Automate the recovery of analytics and ETL job failures
description: Implement automated retry logic and recovery procedures for failed analytics jobs. Use AWS Step Functions for orchestration with built-in error handling, or configure automatic retries in AWS Glue workflows. Design jobs to be idempotent to support safe retries.

title_full: DALREL06-BP05 Build a disaster recovery plan for the analytics infrastructure and data
title: Build a disaster recovery plan for the analytics infrastructure and data
description: Develop and test disaster recovery procedures for your analytics infrastructure and data. Define RTO and RPO objectives, implement cross-region replication for critical data, and maintain runbooks for recovery scenarios.

title_full: DALREL07-BP01 Build a central Data Catalog to store, share, and track metadata changes
title: Build a central Data Catalog to store, share, and track metadata changes
description: Implement a centralized Data Catalog using AWS Glue Data Catalog or AWS Lake Formation to store, share, and track metadata. Controlled changes are necessary for data quality assurance, and a central catalog enables consistent metadata management across the organization.

title_full: DALREL07-BP02 Monitor for data quality anomalies
title: Monitor for data quality anomalies
description: Implement automated data quality monitoring to detect anomalies, schema drift, and data quality degradation. Use AWS Glue Data Quality rules and Amazon CloudWatch metrics to alert on data quality issues before they impact downstream consumers.

title: Trace data lineage
description: Implement data lineage tracking to understand the origin, transformations, and destinations of data throughout your analytics pipeline. This enables impact analysis for changes and helps troubleshoot data quality issues by tracing data back to its source.
